title: Diablo 4 is "trying to move very quickly" to improve storage space, but it's "challenging technically"
description: The team says it has to "get it right" rather than rush "doing it right now" as improving storage space is "challenging technically".

title: Square Enix is "considering various ideas" about further remasters of classic games
description: Addressing investors at a recent shareholders' meeting, the board was asked if it had plans to remaster further games from its archives.

title: These lucky NBA players got a sneaky peek at Call of Duty 2023
description: Participants of this week's NBA Summer League have shared sneaky social media shots over the weekend.

title: EA Sports UFC 5 is on the way
description: The highly-anticipated MMA sequel – the first addition to the franchise since 2020 – was announced overnight.

title: Exoprimal offers cross-platform co-op but no cross-platform party chat
description: Capcom says that while it is "investigating ways" to permit cross-platform chat, "this may take some time".

title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate $1/£1 introductory offer is back
description: Just days after Microsoft hiked the price of its subscription service, the company has reintroduced its $1/£1 month-long trial.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 pricing and specs just leaked in full
description: If you want to know the details of the Galaxy Tab S9 tablets before Samsung launches them read on.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, July 9 (game #531)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
